author: Joachim Bockland

commands.description: List all conversation members in a chat.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-list-members

commands.description: Add a conversationMember to a chat.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-add-member

commands.description: Update the properties of a chat object.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-update-chat

commands.description: Retrieve the list of chats that the user is part of.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-list-chats

commands.description: Generate the login url used for Authorization code flow.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-generate-login-url

commands.description: Retrieve a single chat (without its messages).
commands.name: msgraph-teams-get-chat

commands.description: Send a new message in a chat.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-send-message

commands.description: Retrieve the list of messages in a chat.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-list-messages

commands.description: Run this command if for some reason you need to rerun the authentication process.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-auth-reset

commands.description: Tests connectivity to Microsoft Graph Teams.
commands.name: msgraph-teams-test

integration.description: Microsoft Graph lets your app get authorized access to a user's Teams app in a personal or organization account.
integration.name: O365 Teams (Using Graph API) (Community Contribution)

description: O365 Teams (Using Graph API) gives you authorized access to a userâ€™s Teams enabling you to facilitate communication through teams as that user, or read conversations and/or messages of that user.
name: MicrosoftGraphTeams
